name: createWithAreaCode
description:
Initializes the RtcEngine object.
Deprecated:
                    This method is deprecated. Use createWithContext instead.

parameters.appId: The App ID of your Agora project.

parameters.areaCode: The area code. For details, see AreaCode.

returns:
The RtcEngine instance, if the method call succeeds.
                    An error code, if the call fails.
